sense.name: the act or process of raising funds for some purpose
sense.examples: Financing this new program will be difficult. They decided to forgo the hassles of outside financing to start their company. They are investigating the participation financing of the three banks that were involved.

sense.name: funds that have been raised for a purpose
sense.examples: The venture firm cut off the financing at two million dollars. The financing for the new medical center was about twenty million dollars. John got financing to buy his new Porsche.
